fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Guess a player's alignment at night. If correct, you will deal an Astral Unstoppable attack to your target. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you guess incorrectly, your role is revealed to all players and your target lives.
- With the Necronomicon, an incorrect guess will not reveal your role and you will instead deal a Basic Attack to your target. This is not Astral.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose the Coven.
